english.segment1: So you think that were not the same. When you feel this way. And the lies will fall this time
english.segment2: So you think that it's just a game. Between us. I will swallow my own pride
english.segment3: But you know that you know to get up. That's the way I feel sometimes
english.segment4: And ill stand up, this time, tonight what do you say. Do you feel this way. And the lies will fall this time
